name: Design Oriented Programming
tagline: Coding with the power of the pixel!
body:
DESIGN-ORIENTED PROGRAMMING - INTRODUCTION BOOK


> _synopsis_ This book is the distillation of research and development from decades of work searching for the holy grail in graphical programming innovation. Eureka! By combining the full power of HTML design with the vast capabilities of text grammar programming languages there is finally a path forward to restore substantive innovation to computer programming languages. Design-oriented language is precisely what is needed to provide higher levels of accessibility and usability to support the learn to code movement. > ![Book Cover](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DesignOrientedCode/DesignOrientedProgramming/master/bookcover.jpg)

* [Print Version - COLOR 170 pages](http://www.amazon.com/Design-Oriented-Programming-Beyond-Text-Barrier/dp/1496068653)
* [Print Version - BLK 100 pages](http://www.amazon.com/Introduction-Design-Oriented-Programming-Beyond-Barrier/dp/1499130732)
* _Kindle versions were discontinued due to formatting errors._
* Github and HTML formats are in the works!
* [Wikipedia: Design-Oriented Programming](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Design-Oriented_Programming)
